text:
🗞️@curevac & @Novartis signed an initial agreement for the manufacturing of CureVac’s #Covid19 #vaccine candidate, #CVnCoV. Pending final agreement, Novartis plans to manuf. the #mRNA & bulk drug product of CVnCoV for up to 50M doses by the end of 2021.
➡️https://t.co/E6PfqcJlXA https://t.co/PIyYCa0P4Y
